Use: Stores sequence data and quality scores.
Sequence Alignment Map format. Stores information about reads mapped to a reference genome.
Binary Alignment Map format. The compressed binary version of SAM format.
Another compressed format to store read mapping information.
Variant Call Format. Used to store information about variants inferred for a given sample(s).
Binary variant Call Format. The binary compressed verion of a VCF.
Stores coordinates of regions of interest
